description:
It could not be easier to manage ZIPs than now with SomePythonThings Zip Manager! Create and extract ZIP files in one click!

SomePythonThings Zip manager is an application that lets you compress and extract files in a clever way.
Not as other compression applications, SomePythonThings Zip Manager has been developed to be useful.
SomePythonThings Zip Manager is an open-source application, and it's also 100% free.
Changelog
- Optimized the whole program
- Optimized zip loader
- Optimized zip extractor
- Optimized zip compressor
- Optimized icon provider
- Fixed hangs on big zip files
- Remade stylesheet to match windows 11
